snippet: A few days before Tuesday’s Gold Cup match between Belize and the United States, a man tried to bribe three players from Belize, the team’s coach said.
abstract: United States defeats Belize, 6-1, in Gold Cup soccer match; Belize coach says a man tried to bribe three of his players, days earlier; officials confirm that such incident was reported and say alleged suspect was identified as someone already being monitored by international soccer officials.
lead_paragraph: A few days before Tuesday’s Gold Cup match between Belize and the United States, a man tried to bribe three players from Belize, the team’s coach said.

headline.main: Belize Players Turned Down Match-Fixing Bribe, Coach Says
headline.print_headline: Belize Coach Says Three Players Were Offered a Match-Fixing Bribe

keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
keywords.name: organizations
